org.jetel.graph

Interface InputPort

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InputPortDirect
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcurrentInputPort, Edge, JobflowEdge

    public interface InputPort
    An interface defining operations expected from InputPort object. Input port establishes communication channel between two NODEs.
    Since:
    April 2, 2002
    See Also:
    OutputPort, Node, Edge

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectReader(Node _reader, int portNum)
      An operation that registeres the node which reads data from this port
      long getByteCounter()
      Deprecated. 
      use getInputByteCounter() method instead
      Edge getEdge() 
      long getInputByteCounter()
      Gets the number of bytes passed (so far) through this input port.
      int getInputPortNumber()
      Gets the id number of input port connected reader.
      long getInputRecordCounter()
      Gets the number of records passed (so far) through this input port.
      DataRecordMetadata getMetadata()
      Gets the Metadata describing data records passing through this port
      long getReaderWaitingTime()
      Available only in graph verbose mode.
      long getRecordCounter()
      Deprecated. 
      use getInputRecordCounter() method instead
      int getUsedMemory() 
      Node getWriter()
      Gets the Writer (Node which writes into this port at the other end - if any)
      boolean hasData()
      Method which tests whether data (including EOF flag) is awaiting/ready to be read.
      boolean isEOF()
      This method tests whether EOF mark was sended via this port.
      boolean isOpen()
      Deprecated.  
      DataRecord readRecord(DataRecord record)
      An operation that reads one record from this port
      void reset()
      Reset port for next graph execution.

      • getInputByteCounter

        long getInputByteCounter()
        Gets the number of bytes passed (so far) through this input port.
        Returns:
        number of bytes which passed this input port

      • hasData

        boolean hasData()
        Method which tests whether data (including EOF flag) is awaiting/ready to be read. Following read operation should not block, nonetheless can return null as EOF flag.
        Returns:
        True if read operation won't block due to lack of data

      • getInputPortNumber

        int getInputPortNumber()
        Gets the id number of input port connected reader.
        Returns:

      • reset

        void reset()
           throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Reset port for next graph execution.
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • getUsedMemory

        int getUsedMemory()
        Returns:
        size of allocated memory on the edge (memory footprint)

      • getReaderWaitingTime

        long getReaderWaitingTime()
        Available only in graph verbose mode.
        Returns:
        aggregated time how long the reader thread waits for data

      • getEdge

        Edge getEdge()
        Returns:
        associated edge with this input port
